price: 196. Laat het rondreizen van de ongelovigen in het land jullie niet bedriegen.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
